qas.question: How else can petrologists understand the pressures at which different mineral phases appear?
How else can petrologists understand the temperature at which different mineral phases appear?

answers.text: high temperature and pressure physical experiments

qas.question: Data from physical experiments can be extrapolated to the field to understand what processes?
What do petrologists use to understand magma chamber crystallization?

plausible_answers.text: high temperature and pressure physical experiments

qas.question: What experiments are used to understand how magma flows?
How does the flow of magma change?

plausible_answers.text: the conditions of crystallization of igneous rocks

qas.question: What else can magma flows be used to understand?
What can experiments be used to explain beside magma crystallization?

plausible_answers.text: the conditions of crystallization of igneous rocks

qas.question: What does the magma chamber evolution explain?
What processes occur above the earth?

plausible_answers.text: understand the temperatures and pressures at which different mineral phases appear

qas.question: How do physical experiments explain fluid inclusion data?

plausible_answers.text: pressures at which different mineral phases appear

qas.question: Research regarding metamorphic processes helps explain what about pressure?
